  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103106</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103106</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La lumière voyage en ligne droite</string>
            <string language="en">Light travels in a straight path</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht reist in einen geraden Pfad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz viaja em um trajeto reto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce viaggia in un percorso diritto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά ταξίδια σε ένα ευθύ μονοπάτι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz viaja en un camino recto</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière venant de l'ampoule (cercle) voyage en ligne droite en passant par les écrans horizontalement alignés jusqu'au point E.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light coming from the bulb (circle) travels in a straight path passing through horizontally aligned screens to point E.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ampoule</string>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">trajectoire</string>
            <string language="en">path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">écran</string>
            <string language="en">screen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">chaîne de  caractères</string>
            <string language="en">string</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß das Licht, das von 
der Birne (Kreis) kommt in einen geraden Pfad reist, der durch 
horizontal ausgerichtete Bildschirme zu Punkt E überschreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz que vem do 
bulbo (círculo) viaja em um trajeto reto que passa através das telas
horizontalmente alinhadas ao ponto E.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce che viene
dalla lampadina (cerchio) viaggia in un percorso diritto che passa 
tramite gli schermi orizzontalmente stati allineati al punto E.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το φως που προέρχεται 
από το βολβό (κύκλος) ταξιδεύει σε ένα ευθύ μονοπάτι που περνά
μέσω των οριζόντια ευθυγραμμισμένων οθονών στο σημείο ε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz que viene 
del bulbo (círculo) viaja en un camino recto que pasa a través de 
las pantallas horizontalmente alineadas a la punta E.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bildschirm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichenkette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bulbo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trajeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lampadina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percorso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονοπάτι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οθόνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συμβολοσειρά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bulbo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pantalla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
